name: Heaven simulator
description:
You died on an island and you have to climb the stairs to get to heaven. It sounds easy ? It isn't, belive me.

This game is a rage generator.

RECOMMENDED SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS :

CPU : Core 2 duo E6600 2.4 GHz\Athlon 64 X2 dual core 4400
GPU : Radeon X800 GT
RAM: 2 gb
DIRECT X : 10 dx
